website_summaries.verdict: With the wide shelves of a traditional barrister's case, this affordable option holds 40 pounds of books.
pros: The two shelves adjust in height and each supports 20 pounds
Though constructed from man-made materials, the case is elegant and sturdy
cons: It may show signs of wear sooner than a solid-wood bookcase
Still, owners find it a good quality for the price

customer_reviews.title: Looks impressive, especially at $55 (plus tax) each.  Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Color is accurate. I bought two units. It took two men, 1 hour to assemble the first one. 1/2 hour for the 2nd one. No problems. Unit is heavy. Searched for a 7ft long TV Stand, in similar height.. All were over $500 plus . I had the center cabinet, and saw the book cases would look as good, or better. Very happy with choice. All pieces fit as expected. Excellent craftsman ship (for the price)..I had 2 tall cabinets, next to my component cabinet. Replaced these tall cabinets with the short ones.I can tilt my TV and watch from the dining room , kitchen. and family room.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zee

customer_reviews.title: Attractive shelving with clever design
customer_reviews.text: I set two of these up on either side of a large antique oak desk. Carefully following directions I assembled the first in about an hour, the second in half that time. It is important to orient pieces the right way. While these are not as sturdy as custom solid oak shelving I had made years ago, I have normal books and audio equipment on them with no signs of fatigue or sagging shelves. The top and frame are nicely finished oak; shelves and back appear to be laminate, but they're in shadows if there are items on the shelves, and the whole effect is a lot more elegant than you might expect for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: David Bantz

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured "Wood"
customer_reviews.text: The only thing "oak", much less solid wood, about this bookcase is the top. The rest is manufactured wood with a paper laminate that looks like wood grain. Not a piece intended to last, but for the money, an adequate and functional piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: New York Barney

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Will scratch easily. I covered the top and shelves with clear contact paper. It should last for a few years in my son's room. If you're not looking for furniture to last for more than a few years, it is a great purchase. Came with extra hardware (screws, etc.), which impressed me. (I am always afraid to loose something during my assembly!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design, pretty good quality control, good instructions
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these small ones and 2 of the larger ones as well (and a media version). All are heavy particleboard and they tend to have very good instructions and hardware has always been exactly what was needed (or occasionally a few extra pieces). If it has a fault, it's that the particle board can splinter easily so you have to be VERY VERY CAREFUL when putting the nails into the back to hold on the backboard. In addition this one came with an imperfection in the top which wasn't an issue with this one since it went in the closet. Still a bit annoying. Returning it would be monumentally difficult.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is putting this together now and he threatened me with trouble if I gave this a good rating. If he weren't a Christian I think he would be cussing right now as he attempts to put this together. Also it's particleboard not oak and the back of the bookcase is cardboard. We need to find an unpainted furniture store and get some real wood. We'll keep it though since I got the small one for a few cookbooks in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Berthlot

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sit on top of an existing solid oak credenza. Even though it was a tiny fraction of the cost of the larger piece, it holds its own in terms of apparent quality. The color is a true oak and attractively grained, the edges are evenly planed, and it sits rock-steady flat. If you're not going to spring for designer furniture, this is a very good compromise!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and no formaldehyde but particle board
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and no formaldehyde. However, Make sure you put the dratted thing together right, cause if you put the bottom on backwards there is no going back. Yes, I bought two and did that with one of them. The back piece is VERY thin, but I bought these suckers for $62 and everyone says they look nice. Update: Not wood. Particle board that if even a drop of water or condensation will make a bloated mark and Very thin finish eventually just peels off on its own. My yard sale finds so much better. The photo is after I coated with 2 cots of finish to hide the marks and protect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Raine

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality, not good instructions
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible hard to assemble because the instructions are not clear at all and the individual parts are not labeled. Also it would have helped if they gave a few extra screws just in case, like most other furniture products. The top layer “wood” of the bookshelf peels and cracks easily. It was already chipped in some areas. If you do get this just be sure to pay close attention to what little assembly instructions that are included. Take your time. In the end, it’s functional and doesn’t look bad from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia Carson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bookcase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. I bought two to hold all my extra kids books for the grand children. They may not be solid oak, but they look good to me. I knew I wasn't getting hand crafted for the price. They were both put together and ready for books in less than 30 minutes. They fit in with other furniture and seem sturdy and attractive. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Oldham

customer_reviews.title: solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nicest piece of particle board furniture I have ever had. Real solid. One defect. The wood was chipped around the predrilled holes at the base, 2 of them. Had to color them in with a yellow/orange marker. Barely shows now.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cramer Austin, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small bookcase to fit under my window. I also didn't want it to look cheap in the same room with our Amish-made bookshelves. I was very pleasantly surprised at how ice it looks. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Kross

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble small bookcase
customer_reviews.text: My exercise room is also a place where I store books. It's not really a library because there is no space for reading. But at a good price this let me have my books easy accessible, much more so than a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stein

customer_reviews.title: A small redesign would earn an extra star
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a 5-star review, except for the fact that the toe-kick is made of MDF, and it tends to split when the screws are tightened. No, the screws were NOT over-tightened. The bookcase is perfect for what I wanted it for I will probably reinforce the shelves to prevent bowing in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: R. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bookcase that doesn't look like junk!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase went together slick as a whistle and it looks nice! It's plenty sturdy and fits well in the living room with our other honey oak furniture.
customer_reviews.author: BAJ

customer_reviews.title: arrived with two left side pieces, no right side piece
customer_reviews.text: it was a nightmare. besides having two left sides and no right side piece, the holes were not spaced evenly. the box was so heavy that return was not feasible. ultimately my handyman redrilled the holes and was finally able to assemble the bookcase. no one inspected that package at the factory for sure.
customer_reviews.author: lois pearson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my plants
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my living room. The shelves are sturdy and cute. Perfect for home accents. They were so easy to build. After I built the first one the second one took me less than twenty minutes. Don't pay to have someone build these.
customer_reviews.author: brktntattoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these shelves to use in my office to store paper, notebooks, office stuff, some fairly heavy. I put them back to back and have my flatbed scanner and adding machine on top. They fit in a small space in my small office. Works really well. I am going to add a third, taller shelf to my office shelves. The instructions were a little bit hard to follow but I figured it all out. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda SM

customer_reviews.title: Great little bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Assembly wasnt any more difficult than I expected it to be. It looks great in my kids' bedroom! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: thatchickwithabook

customer_reviews.title: It is manufactured in Canada and that was good news , not China ..
customer_reviews.text: THe directions are weak . One thing except for a couple of nails for the back piece , a white rubber mallet should be used (as I did) to tap the pieces together ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can only carry 25 lb. not good for Aquarium stand.
customer_reviews.text: Did not tell us how much pound it can carry, i had to call the company. It should be on your advertisement. Looks sturdy can only carry 25 pounds, we wanted to place an Aquarium on it.
customer_reviews.author: E.R

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: All things considered, it's a nice piece of furniture. Definately not all solid wood but didn't expect that for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little shelf for kids. Real enough looking. Sturdy enough to hold a lot of kids books. If you are picky about how real something looks then spend the extra hundreds of dollars for a real wood shelf. For the price, this item can't be beat. It was easy to assemble and arrived in good shape with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Exstasis

customer_reviews.title: Instructions for assembly were a bit sketchy. Would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for assembly were a bit sketchy. Would have helped if parts (the panels) had some sort of sticker to identify. The second unit was assembled in less than 15-minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat window shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cat shelf as my cat is kind of heavy and my last one broke. Don't see this happening to this. Looks good. Fits good. And on top of this it is helping me with my book collection. Very happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.author: morgaine hogan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bookcase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sturdy bookcase and worth the money. Just remember it only has about 11” to top. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Novak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bookshelf. Easy to assemble. Excellent quality and beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Tina Johnston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fiberboard with Fake Wood Covering. Back really Cheap and Bulges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: It came fast and went together easy. I am handicap so I had a young friend help me. Maybe 45 mins and all was good. I am mechanically incline but need a help on projects. Fairly easy to put together and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Bookecase
customer_reviews.text: Well made for engineered wood and has real wood appearance. Easy to assemble. The only thing that could be better is real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Downer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value, nice looking bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item was EXCELLENT, except one thing.....The instructions were absolutely horrible! I had to assemble by just looking at the picture and figuring it out, which was not very hard as there are only a few pieces. It's very sturdy, LOOKS like REAL wood, and fits nicely in the bedroom......HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Maybe half hour. Looks good. Very soft wood though. Within 15 minutes of putting it together and starting to place things in and on it, I managed to scratch the top of it. Don't even know how. One other thing. This is more of a chocolate than an espresso but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: michael mosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Good news - this is a good and sturdy book ...
customer_reviews.text: Good news - this is a good and sturdy book case. Looks good and fits with other furniture. Bad news - the assembly instructions are nearly useless. Anyone who has never assembled something like this would have a very difficult time following the included assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: j mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to assemble. It is sturdy and attractive...Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Flawed
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice and sturdy, however, the wood started to crack when my husband screwed together the pieces. He wasn't even applying that much pressure. Thankfully the split wood does not show. I expected this piece of furniture to get roughed uo over time....but not during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McKee

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: Directions are wrong, making it difficult to assemble. Bookcase arrived with defective part, replaced by manufacturer. Not thrilled with the packing tape that holds the back together as well as the top-back & back margins showing unlaminated particleboard, & plastic drill-hole covers on the outside of the case. This won't last long enough to hand down to my hamster's grandchildren, muchless my own.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it a 2 stars cause it's cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it a 2 stars cause it's cheap and in the backroom it may last a year or two. Not very well made nor very strong. It looks cheap too. Should have bought the one from the competition that's about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way this was packaged and I'm sure I'll enjoy it once I can figure out where to buy the hardware to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: it is actually quite good and strong, all the pieces were there, and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Oak 2-shelf bookcase is very nice Like it much Frances Becker
customer_reviews.author: Frances Becker

customer_reviews.title: Absolute perfection!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. Packed perfectly, easy to out together and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Very sturdy. I had someone put it together for me so I don't know how easy that was.
customer_reviews.author: ilse49

customer_reviews.title: Best for the book!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and replaced our old bookcase. Easy to assemble and will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great book shelf
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly in my room, nice piece of inexpensive furniture
customer_reviews.author: Jenn A

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was super easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bookshelf, it took me longer to unpack it than it did to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good match with my file cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together (disclaimer - I have a lot of experience putting furniture together!) and looks beautiful. Was a little concern about the color when I order because I wanted to match a file cabinet but it turned out to be a pretty good match. Also, very classy looking. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rchriste12

customer_reviews.title: Good Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Good quality, easy to assemble, and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase. I did have to assemble it, however the directions were easy to understand and follow. It feels very durable, and it has met my expectations in every way. I would highly recommend it. C. Anderson
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: bookcase
customer_reviews.text: It was more expensive than i wanted to go,but then again it is exactally what i was looking for sizewise.everything fit together perfect.I put it together in 15min.Yes the shelf pins are plastic,but they hold a set of encyclopedias i have on them.The backing is laminated cardboard,but who cares it looks nice.It is expensive but what isn't these days.I'd say if its what you want,go for it.I am satisfied and glad i bought it after hemming a hawing about the price for about a month i'm glad i did it.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Broke upon assembly. I should’ve known better than to buy a book shelf for 65 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: david banfield

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bookcase but the directions are complicated AND BE CAREFUL bc the pieces to connect are too long and you will end up damaging the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rlo1978

customer_reviews.title: Solid Little Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. Looks pretty nice and holds everything I need it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic utilitarian bookcase
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a good deal. For your basic utilitarian bookcase, it fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother. He uses it to store books, magazines. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MGB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a TV stand
customer_reviews.text: It takes some thought to put together - the pieces aren't labeled. It looks great and fully serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DCFscream

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, and looks great! Fits all my art books well.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt S. Ozinga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bookcase that matches our offices oak desk that ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little bookcase that matches our offices oak desk that have been in use for years. Sturdy enough to hold a few odds and ends, I wouldn't recommend using it for any super heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bookcase for the money. Looks cheap from the back. Seems to be sturdy and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: gdm

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions. Just ok sturdiness. Not so great value even though the cost was low.
customer_reviews.author: sandra mower

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well built piece of furniture. A little pricey, but worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy shelf...easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was perfect for what I needed, and assembly was quick and easy. A couple of the nails that were provided to fasten on the backing were bent, but there were still enough to get the job done. All in all, I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice item - assembly instructions are not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bookcase. All parts came in tact from the shipper. The assembly instructions are not the best but with a little perseverance it went together nicely. Very happy with the item it is will constructed, nice color and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Tweeddale

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it just deep enough for a large book and still slim enough for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & design
customer_reviews.text: Color displayed online was accurate. They matched my kitchen cupboards perfectly. Good quality & design.I would like to buy another 2-shelf unit when available.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Mae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had it together in less than 30 Minutes. Looks great in our new office! Missing two little dots to cover the screws. and requested them but have not received yet.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect in the space I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: motherof6

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Construction was easy and proved very tight and secure. I would buy a second one if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Burst

customer_reviews.title: Good bookshelf for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf was fine for the price. It would be nice to have a dark colored back, but that's not a big deal. Also, the screws in the bottom shelf are visible if the contents of the shelf don't sit at the very front to cover them up. Still not a deal breaker. The shelf was easy to put together, and only took about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anderson

customer_reviews.title: installation difficult
customer_reviews.text: installation hardware a little confusing. Had to ad lib. But it worked out
customer_reviews.author: John A Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Solid and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to hold a few miscellaneous items in my sewing room. It assembled easily and looks great with my other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bookcase for the price. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Was a perfect fit in the space available. Helped me organize my office and was a great match to the existing furniture. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leach

customer_reviews.title: I love this little bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bookcase. It was easy to put together and it looks great. Perfect for all our library books.
customer_reviews.author: N. Valdes-Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the bookcase. The assembly was quick and simple.
customer_reviews.author: rcamera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits the spot I had for it perfectly
customer_reviews.author: B L Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Prepac Oak Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Small enough for the space I had. Easy to assemble. The color matches my furniture as though they were purchased together. I am very HAPPY with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to build
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to build, even with a baby bump, and I got it put together in less thatn an hour. No missing pieces and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiela Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shelf--it sits next to a 100 year old piece and does the company that made it proud....
customer_reviews.author: LEONARD

customer_reviews.title: Good little bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: Using this in our nursery as a book case. Works great and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Maley

customer_reviews.title: Need better directions
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality..color was what I expected. The directions were not easy to follow. I would have liked each piece to have been better identified. The back piece to the bookcase is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Taran  Radloff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just the color and size I needed! Perfect. I would highly recommend this bookshelf and I may even purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Panzarella

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just what was advertised. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Easy to put together. They are attractive and the color matches the decor we have in that room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble and is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DBB

customer_reviews.title: Side table
customer_reviews.text: I just love my bookcase. It has worked out great for a side table and a bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Haussler

customer_reviews.title: Oak Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: The picture of this cabinet is not what I ordered or received. I ordered a beautiful corner Oak cabinet. I loved tha corner cabinet that I ordered through you. After that I ordered another corner oak cabinet for my sister and another for a friend, so in all I ordered 3 corner oak cabinets which every one loves.
customer_reviews.author: Shelvey J. Stammer

customer_reviews.title: Keep your expectations reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Measurements listed were accurate, and the bookshelf fit into the tight space under my kitchen counter. Color pictured was pretty accurate. Assembly was easy, not too many pieces. Instructions were adequate. Backing is a piece of cardboard to nail on, but not the worst I've ever seen. I've purchased hokey and cheap before, and this is a little better than that. All in all, a nice little piece of furniture that's appropriate to the amount I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Overt Agent

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: It broke during assembly. It is cheap material. Now I'm out $70 and still don't have a bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little bookcase! Just what I was looking for to hold my grandson’s books.
customer_reviews.author: MerryBee

customer_reviews.title: Product evaluation.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, no damage was found, no missing assembly hardware. Instructions were straight forward. It is an attractive unit that matches my existing furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Royal

product_meta.title: Maple 2-shelf Bookcase
product_meta.description: Color:MapleThis upscale and attractive look is a great addition to your study, office or living room. With three sizes to choose from, our Sonoma series bookcases can be individually arranged or grouped together to create a library wall filled with books and collectibles. Notable enhancements include a profiled top, side moldings, an arched kick plate and co-ordinated Oak or Maple backer. Constructed from a combination of high quality, laminated composite woods, this attractive series offers extremely good value for stylish yet budget conscious buyers.
feature_bullets: Constructed from high quality laminated composite woods

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars222 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
